author: Reuters Editorial
title: UPDATE 1-Olympics-Curling-Women's round robin results
text: Feb 18 (Gracenote) - Olympic women's curling round robin results in Gangneung on Sunday. RESULTS Britain 6 Sweden 8 Canada 10 Switzerland 8 China 5 Korea 12 STANDINGS P W D L F A Pts 1.
